title: Puritan Allowance
description: Your parents wish that you learn the value of money by depriving you of it, but recognize in this day and age that a nominal stipend is deemed necessary for a sustenance-based social life.

title: Colorful Language: Blue
description: Vulgarity and voice are much more powerful when heard in blue. With colorful language, you'll have the option set your chat text to appear blue.

title: Colorful Language: Green
description: Vulgarity and voice are much more powerful when heard in green. With colorful language, you'll have the option set your chat text to appear green.
